Bless/Buff: Fire Resistance +5, Shock Resistance +5, Cold Resistance +5, Poison Resistance +10
 
(Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], Affects Friendlies Only [enemyimmune], May Use Underwater [uwok])
This powerful enchantment protects an entire army from the power of the elements. The units become resistant to flames, frost, lightning and poison.
